Source of Citations and References for Analysis Purposes: A Comparative Assessment .A Brittain, J. M. The uses to which analysis of bibliographical references and citations can be put are categorized.. Five sources of references and citations are identified, and their advantages and disadvantages for various purposes assessed and compared.. Comparative studies of different sources are urged.. .X 33	1	753 36	1	753 41	1	753 48	1	753 89	1	753 97	1	753 102	1	753 111	1	753 112	1	753 163	1	753 167	1	753 183	1	753 184	1	753 193	1	753 199	1	753 203	1	753 210	1	753 225	1	753 269	1	753 360	1	753 373	1	753 545	1	753 552	1	753 587	1	753 605	1	753 613	1	753 614	2	753 635	1	753 638	3	753 735	1	753 747	1	753 748	1	753 750	1	753 753	5	753 756	2	753 757	1	753 764	1	753 766	1	753 767	2	753 775	1	753 782	1	753 784	1	753 787	1	753 788	1	753 789	1	753 792	1	753 793	1	753 800	1	753 808	2	753 821	1	753 831	1	753 905	1	753 952	1	753 953	2	753 977	1	753 983	1	753 1016	1	753 1023	1	753 1030	1	753 1055	1	753 1083	2	753 1087	1	753 1088	1	753 1090	1	753 1135	1	753 1201	1	753 1210	1	753 1254	1	753 1256	1	753 1260	2	753 1275	2	753 1276	1	753 1278	2	753 1280	1	753 1285	1	753 1286	1	753 1287	1	753 1302	3	753 1335	1	753 1369	1	753 1373	1	753 1390	1	753 1397	1	753 1417	1	753 1418	1	753 1428	2	753 1432	1	753 1432	1	753
